title: Memory told of a nighttime road crossing near Coal City
observed: It was in November of 1970 Thanksgiving weekend around 2:00 a.m. Going west on Lorenzo Rd 1 or 2 miles west of I-55 a big foot walked out in front of our car. It crossed the road real slow and had no fear of us. Had burnt orange hair, stood 6 ft tall, had massive legs and eyes the size of silver dollars. The eyes shown emerald green when the head lights shown on them
